item.title: Big Tech companies, foreign governments scramble after Trump slaps $100,000 fee on H-1B visas
item.description: The announcement to impose a $100,000 annual fee on H-1B visas sent shockwaves through corporate America.

item.title: Trump aide denies Jimmy Kimmel suspended because of WH pressure despite Carr threat
item.description: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt on Saturday denied late-night TV host Jimmy Kimmel was suspended because of pressure from the Trump admin...

item.title: Ted Cruz compares FCC Chair Carr to Mafia boss in Jimmy Kimmel warnings

item.title: Trump says 'I'm winning' after judge tosses his $15 billion NY Times lawsuit
item.description: Judge Steven Merryday noted that Trump's defamation lawsuit against The New York Times "consumes" 85 pages.
